sourcesContent:
import { Container, Card, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useQuery } from "react-query"; import { API } from "../config/api"; import { useContext } from "react"; import { UserContext } from "../context/userContext"; export default function Consultation() { const [state] = useContext(UserContext) let id = state.user.ID let { data: consultations } = useQuery('consultationsCache', async () => { const response = await API.get('/consultations/' + id); return response.data.Data; }); return (

Consultation

{consultations?.length !== 0 && consultations?.map((item, index) => (
{item.Subject}
16 April 2020

17 Mei 2020

Keluhan : {item.Description}

{ item.Status === "waiting" ?

Waiting for reply

 : item.Status === "success" ?

Reject

:

Reject

 } )) } ) }
